document_data.name: ''Statue of Kisonraathiisar''
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Statue of Kisonraathiisar''''' was a monument dedicated to the [[topaz dragon]] and the first king of [[Westgate]], [[Kisonraathiisar]].

{{quote|''The ancient wyrm Kisonraathiisar, upon whose lair Westgate was built. Slain by our founder, [[Saldrinar]] of the [[Seven Spells]], in [[-349 DR]].''|The inscription on the plaque}}
document_data.Description: The ''Statue of Kisonraathiisar'' stood on the [[Harbor Loop]] of Westgate, on the street's western side, in the Loop's inner block. In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the statue could be found to the southwest of [[Okuzo's Imports]] shop. The masterfully sculpted statue mistakingly depicted the wyrm as a [[red dragon]], but, despite that, was impressive. Of course, it was not built to scale. Benches were placed on the sides of the dragon statue, two on each side.
